We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private VolumeWeightedAveragePriceIndicator _vwap;
// In Initialize()
_vwap = VWAP(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_vwap.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "VWAP Current", _vwap.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.vwap = self.VWAP(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.vwap.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VWAP Current", self.vwap.Current);
